ti

Interface RetrievalModel

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Cosine, CosineWithFeedback

    public interface RetrievalModel
    This interface defines methods implemented by a retrieval model.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ArrayList<Tuple<Integer,Double>> runQuery(String queryText, Index index, DocumentProcessor docProcessor)
      Runs the given query and returns the list of documents sorted by similarity.

    • Method Detail

      • runQuery

        ArrayList<Tuple<Integer,Double>> runQuery(String queryText,
                                        Index index,
                                        DocumentProcessor docProcessor)
        Runs the given query and returns the list of documents sorted by similarity.
        Parameters:
        queryText - the text of the query.
        index - the index to search in.
        docProcessor - the DocumentProcessor to extract query terms.
        Returns:
        a list of Tuples where the first item is the docID and the second one the similarity score.
